name: Dysmemoria
description:
This game's story begins at the end of another story.
At a psychiatric ward in one of the treatment rooms sits a patient; our main character, James. James is currently undergoing treatment for his catatonia, as the doctor tells him "Try to go deeper, James. Your memories, try to go deeper".
Inside James' head, he's having the same nightmare over and over again. He's trying to escape the haunting manifestations of his repressed memories while traversing the twisted surreality of his nightmarish dreamscape.

In this tense 3D platformer you play as James, who is trying to escape the manifestations of his repressed memories in his recurring nightmares. By using fast-paced platforming, you will traverse James' nightmarish dreamscapes, and survive for longer and longer.

Are you able to go down the rabbit hole into James' nightmares, uncover what's haunting him, and find some kind of closure for James' story?

Controls:

  • WASD / Left-Analog - Run / Movement
  • Space / A - Jump
  • Shift / Right Trigger - Dash
  • Control / B - Slide
  • Escape / Menu - Pause
